title: BBC Local Live: Norfolk on Wednesday, 11 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: a woman has died overnight in a house fire in ditchingham , near bungay .
sea defence work totalling £ 1.5m work is put on hold while seals have their pups at horsey .
cuts to ivf treatment possible in south norfolk .
we 'll have more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we will be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all your local news , sport , weather and travel plus hopefully the odd story that does n't quite fit the mould .
if you care to comment or would like to get in touch please do so via email , twitter or facebook .
wishing you a very pleasant evening .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: cuts to ivf treatment possible in south norfolk
text: south norfolk is the latest commissioning group considering cutting back ivf treatment on the nhs - saying it needs to find savings as it 's facing a £ 6.6m deficit .
a campaign group says infertility is a recognised medical condition and over recent years the region 's gone from being one of the best providers to one of the worst .
we should n't be still arguing now that this is n't a legitimate treatment that should be funded on the nhs . ''
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: weather : cooler tonight with sunshine first thing tomorrow
text: tonight will begin cloudy but will turn cooler overnight , with temperatures down to 8c ( 46f ) .
a fine start tomorrow with a good deal of sunshine , plus highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
weather has your local forecasts .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: crowds gather across norfolk in silence to mark armistice day
text: silence fell across the towns , villages and city of norfolk today in remembrance of the nation 's war dead .
this ceremony in wymondham took place at 11:00 ; the time in 1918 when the guns fell silent along the western front in europe .
author: BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: news : young people 's mental health services get extra £ 1.9m funding neighbours say fatal fire was 'like a horror movie '
text: the main news stories this evening :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: abellio greater anglia apologises for train cancellations
text: train company abellio greater anglia says sorry for local cancellations :
apologies to customers affected by recent cancellations on local routes in norfolk suffolk essex & cambridgeshire rh
@ twitterid what has that got to do with all the signal failures we keep having though ?

documents.title: mental health services for young people to benefit from cash injection
text: children and young people experiencing mental health difficulties will benefit from targeted help at an earlier stage , after the nhs awarded local services an extra £ 1.9m a year .
healthcare providers are planning to create another 11.5 posts to cope with the 57 % increase in crisis referrals since 2013 .
one of the areas that government has specifically dedicated some of this money to is around children 's eating disorders , of which we 've seen a huge increase in the last few years . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: thetford rapper releases first single with national label
text: thetford rapper franko fraize is celebrating after releasing his first single on polydor .
`` oi !
oi ! ''
has been released on polydor and the artist has been chatting to bbc radio norfolk 's stephen bumfrey about his national label deal .
massive thanks to @ twitterid for having me on the show !
always a pleasure mate
@ twitterid always good having you on the show .
have a great tour !

documents.title: woman arrested after police found her in king 's lynn wheelie bin
text: a 19-year-old woman remains in police custody today after being arrested by police who found her hiding in a wheelie bin .
author: Lynn News

documents.title: uea footballers in cup victory
text: the university of east anglia women 's football team are through to the second round of the midlands conference cup .
they beat bedford university 2-1 at colney playing fields in norwich this afternoon .
goals from jackie zavala and courtney charlton take them through to the last 16 .
author: Rob Butler
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: stolen meat , alcohol , chocolate and cosmetics found at norwich address
text: three women have been arrested on sus of handling stolen goods after officers discovered stolen items worth about £ 10,000 at a norwich address .
police say they found meat , alcohol , chocolate , cosmetics , clothing and toys at an address in hobart square .
two women in their 40s are in custody .
the other , in her 60s , has been released on bail .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: three arrested after police find stolen goods worth £ 10,000 at norwich address
text: police say three women have been arrested on sus of handling stolen goods after officers discovered stolen property worth about £ 10,000 at a norwich address .
£ 10,000 of stolen goods have been recovered from an address in norwich -

documents.title: mental health services for youngsters given £ 1.9m cash boost
text: children and teenagers with eating disorders are to get more targeted help fromnorfolk 's mental health services following an injection of additional cash .
norfolk 's clinical commissioning group has been given an extra £ 1.9m a year from nhs england .
eating disorders is one area where the money will be spent ; help for primary school children with mental health issues is another .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: theatre royal gives local actors an rsc 'dream ' boost
text: a group of norwich amateur thespians were put through their paces over the weekend by the cream of shakespearean professionals .
author: Norwich Spy

documents.title: staff observe two minutes ' silence at norfolk 's county hall
text: people across norfolk , including staff at norfolk county council , observed two minutes ' silence to mark armistice day , in memory of those who died in war .
ceremonies have been held across the county this morning .
if you went to a tribute and have any you 'd like to share please do so via email , twitter or facebook .

documents.title: greater anglia : timetable changes tonight
text: abellio greater anglia is tweeting about timetable changes between london and norwich :

documents.title: investigations begin into fatal ditchingham house fire
text: an investigation is under way to find out why a fire broke out at a house in ditchingham , near bungay , last night , killing a woman inside .
norfolk fire and rescue service confirmed smoke alarms were fitted in the 100-year-old cottage but that it would be checking to see if they worked .
jonathan wilby of the fire service spoke to bbc radio norfolk .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: businesses fear closure of stalham 's last bank will drive trade away
text: local traders say they 're worried the closure of natwest bank in stalham next month will send shoppers elsewhere .
natwest says arrangements are being made for customers to access their accounts from the local post office .
barclays closed its branch in september and the nearby towns of reepham and long stratton have also seen banks shutting recently .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: news : a couple living next door to a fatal house fire say it was like a `` horror movie ''
text: the main news stories this lunchtime :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: weather : brighter spells and breezy this afternoon
text: this afternoon will be a great time to hang out the washing !
brighter and breezy with temperatures staying mild at 14c ( 57f ) .
weather has your local forecast .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: norfolk police say a47 now flowing freely following crash
text: police say road is fully open and traffic on a47 moving freely again according to this tweet :
# norfolkroads # a47 following the earlier incident with a tractor and a tanker , traffic is now flowing normally , thank you for your pateince

documents.title: norwich evening news : the power set for norwich showcase
text: phil 'the power ' taylor is leading the back page of the norwich evening news :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: police chief unveils new wwi plaque to mark armistice day
text: norfolk police have tweeted a photograph showing unveiling of new world war one plaque at its headquarters in wymondham :
cc simon bailey marks # armisticeday by unveiling a # wwi memorial plaque at occ

documents.title: gayton residents back new school , but not its proposed site
text: dozens of residents have backed multi-million pound plans to re-locate a village school , but not to the site officials want to build it on .
author: Lynn News

documents.title: ditchingham fire 'like a horror movie ' , say neighbours
text: a couple say that had a fire that killed their nextdoor neighbour broken out in the small hours they could have been `` burnt alive in our own beds '' .
the windows were exploding and flames were shooting out of everything - it was horrendous .
you could n't see out here or bear to breathe it looked like a horror movie . ''
carol and sidney buggs were alerted by another resident in loddon road at about 21:00 last night when the terraced cottage next to theirs was well alight .
firefighters arrived soon afterwards and found the body of an elderly woman inside .
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: ditchingham fire : neighbour speaks of attempted rescue
text: a neighbour who tried in vain to rescue a woman from a burning house in ditchingham , near bungay , last night says thick smoke prevented him from going into the building .
jonathan robinson , who lives three doors down from the cottage in loddon road , told me he found a side door unlocked but decided not to enter after being met by thick acrid smoke .
i feel sorry for her and for the people who live next door .
they had no idea at all and if my wife had n't gone round and knocked on the door and told them to get out the house , obviously they could have been quite seriously injured as well . ''
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: abellio greater anglia : train cancellations
text: some rail services beween norwich and cambridge are cancelled , according to this tweet from abellio greater anglia :
11:16 - cancellations to some norwich - cambridge services no other major disruption to report at present .
rs
@ twitterid how long until the repairs are completed .
this is getting silly now .
# impossibletocommute

documents.title: the impact of ww1 on the wayland area
text: the wayland partnership development trust heritage groupis holding a weekend of events over november 14 & 15 presenting their research so far on the impact of wwi specifically on the wayland area .
author: The Breckland View

documents.title: armistice day : nation remembers war dead
text: a two-minute silence will shortly be observed across the uk to remember the nation 's war dead .
it starts at the 11th hour of the 11th day of the 11th month - the time in 1918 when the guns finally fell silent along the western front .
services are being held across the country .
armistice day follows similar ceremonies on remembrance sunday to pay tribute to all those who died in world wars one and two and in every conflict since .

documents.title: neighbours 'driven back by smoke ' in attempted fire rescue
text: neighbours were beaten back by thick smoke and flames as they tried to rescue a woman from her burning home in ditchingham , near bungay , according to the fire service .
fire crews who arrived shortly after 21:00 last night found the woman 's body in the living room where the fire had broken out before spreading rapidly round the rest of the 100-year-old cottage .
they ( neighbours ) tried to get in but were driven back by the smoke which was very thick and pouring out of the property . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: eastern daily press : mills determined to take his chance
text: here is today 's back page of the edp :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: one person injured after in crash on a47 and drivers facing long delays
text: a man in his 50s has been treated at the scene by medics following a crash between a petrol tanker and a tractor on the a47 near norwich .
there 's severe disruption for drivers on roads including the a11 near the thickthorn roundabout at cringleford and the a140 dunston road .
there are queues of two miles eastbound on the a47 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: norwich evening news : tills ring out for norwich stores
text: here is the front page story on the norwich evening news :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: eastern daily press : house blaze tragedy
text: the ditchingham house fire death is the story leading the edp this morning :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: travel news : long delays anticipated on a47 , a11 and a140 after crash
text: police say there are severe delays on the a11 and a140 after a petrol tanker crashed with a tractor and trailer a short while ago on the a47 .
the accident is between harford bridge and the thickthorn roundabout .
one lane is blocked on the a47 eastbound towards great yarmouth and drivers are being advised to find alternative routes .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: neighbours attempted to rescue woman who died in fire
text: norfolk fire and rescue servicehas confirmed neighbours tried to break into a burning house where a woman diedbut were beaten back by flames .
the woman was found dead in the house in ditchingham , near bungay , by fire crews at around 21:00 last night .
a cordon has been put up around the house in loddon road while investigations take place .
author: Kate Scotter
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: norfolk police : long delays expected on a47 great yarmouth-bound
text: the police have tweeted that long delays are expected after an incident on the a47 :
# norfolkroad # a47 road blocked yarmouth bound between a11 and a140 , long delays expected , find an alternate route to avoid a wait

documents.title: sea defence work delayed to allow seals to give birth
text: work to shore up the sea defences at horsey , near great yarmouth , has been put on hold to allow seals to have their pups .
the environment agency is shoring up the defences with thousands of tonnes of rock .
the agency says it 's had to build the delay into its planning and that defence work will be carried out further south and north along the coast where there are no seals at the moment .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: king 's lynn town suffer penalty heartbreak
text: king 's lynn townhave been knocked out of the southern league 's cup by histon .
after a 2-2 draw in normal time , the linnets went down 5-4 on penalties .
teenager dylan edge scored his first senior goal for the club to make it 2-0 before histon hit back .
david bridges missed the 10th penalty to hand histon the win .
author: Phil Daley
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: steve beaton makes last 16 at grand slam of darts
text: north walsham 's steve beaton has made the second round of the grand slam of darts despite a narrow defeat to martin adams .
the `` bronzed adonis '' lost 5-4 , but made it through to the knock-out stages by virtue of leg difference and will play world number one michael van gerwen in the next round .
bradwell 's mervyn king is out of the tournament losing five legs to three at the hands of suffolk 's peter wright .
author: Phil Daley
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: ditchingham village 'absolutely shocked ' by fire death
text: people living in the village where a woman died in a house fire overnight say the death is a dreadful tragedy .
it 's a very , very close community and everyone is absolutely shocked. ``
fire crews arrived to find the woman dead inside the property in ditchingham , near bungay , at about 21:00 last night .
author: Janet Harnden
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: woman killed in a house fire in ditchingham
text: a woman has been killed in a house fire at ditchingham , near bungay .
police are n't confirming the details at the moment but locally the victim has been described as an older woman who lived alone .
fire crews were called to the house in loddon road at 21:00 last night to find the woman dead inside .
author: Janet Harnden
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: abellio greater anglia : cancellations to branch line services
text: some local branch trains have been cancelled , according to this tweet from greater anglia :
08:00 - cancellations to norwich branch line services no other major disruption to report at present .
rs
@ twitterid
@ twitterid sudbury line is closed !

documents.title: weather : cloudy but dry
text: today will stay dry , albeit cloudy and grey .
there may be the odd bright spell if you 're lucky and it will be mild again , temperatures reaching 15c ( 59f ) .
weather has more local forecasts .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: news : a woman dies overnight in a house fire sea defence work put on hold while seals have their pups

documents.title: hello and welcome to norfolk live on armistice day
text: good morning from the team on wednesday , 11 november .
we 're all set to bring you the latest happenings in the county , including the weather , travel and sport until 18:00 this evening .
if you 'd like to comment or have a story you can get in touch via email , twitter or facebook .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live
